name: granny square bag
notes:
granny square bag by carolyn calderon

this is an on trend crochet purse design and a great way to use up leftover yarn or plan out your favorite colors. an easy square, and intermediate jaygo method to join the squares into the shape, then add a tubular rope handle to complete the look of this pretty bag.

pattern pdf includes photo tutorial on the basic granny square.

please see pattern website for more information.

thank you for your interest in my designs.
have a great day,
carolyn
